#!/usr/bin/env python

MAX=10**100
fibonnacis=[1, 1]
while fibonnacis[-1] < MAX:
    fibonnacis.append(fibonnacis[-1] + fibonnacis[-2])
del fibonnacis[0]

def binary_search(v):
    il = 0
    iu = len(fibonnacis) - 1
    while il < iu:
        i = (il + iu) / 2
        if fibonnacis[i] == v: return i
        if fibonnacis[i] < v:
            il = i + 1
        else:
            iu = i - 1
    return iu

def get(a, b):
    ia = binary_search(a)
    if fibonnacis[ia] < a:
        ia += 1
    ib = binary_search(b)
    if fibonnacis[ib] > b:
        ib -= 1
    return max(0, ib  - ia + 1)

def main():
    while True:
        a, b = map(int, raw_input().split())
        if a == b == 0: break
        print get(a, b)

main()
